newsitem.title: USA: GT Interactive's Duke Nukem to rescue Penthouse Pets.
newsitem.headline: GT Interactive's Duke Nukem to rescue Penthouse Pets.

text.p: Duke Nukem, a popular character from a bloody video game, will come to the rescue of Penthouse Pets.

GT Interactive Software Corp., a video game software publisher, said Thursday it will release a special level for the Duke Nukem 3D video game where the title hero saves Penthouse Magazine models from aliens.

Duke Nukem is one of the best-selling -- and bloodiest -- video games ever. In the game, the title character roams through alien landscapes trying to stop outer space villians from abducting Earth women.
Between blasting aliens with machine guns and dropping lewd one-liners, Duke stops to ogle women throughout the game.
Game players will be able to download Penthouse Paradise Level from GT Interactive's World Wide Web site (http://www.gtinteractive.com).
